sentences.en: A transparent, highly flammable liquid , C 4 H 8 O, used in synthesizing resins.

sentences.en: Clean up spilled medicines, bleaches and gasoline and other flammable liquids.

sentences.en: However, anhydrous ammonia is also toxic, corrosive, and flammable.
sentences.cn: 但是, 含水氨还是有毒 、 腐蚀性和可燃的.

sentences.en: In particular are easy to leakage, flammable, explosive liquid delivery.

sentences.en: In the wet state Thortex Aqua - Tech W . P . is flammable.
sentences.cn: 在潮湿的状态下,索泰防水涂层材料属于易燃品.

sentences.en: Look, under the warning section, It'says this hairspray is flammable.
sentences.cn: 你看, 在注意事项中说,这瓶喷发露是易燃品.

sentences.en: Production process used in flammable explosive coal powder drying is empoldered.

sentences.en: Pyjamas made from flammable material have been removed from most shops.
sentences.cn: 大部分商店都不再出售用易燃材料做的睡衣了.

sentences.en: Sand laland Get anything flammable out of here. The ammo, too.

sentences.en: Scope application: the plant that contains no flammable, explosive, and corrosive gases.
sentences.cn: 适用范围: 不含易燃 、 易爆及腐蚀性气体的厂房.

sentences.en: The minimum ignition energy for flammable mixtures containing hydrogen is extremely low.
sentences.cn: 可燃的含氢混合物的最小点燃能量非常低.

sentences.en: The prohibition of carrying flammable or corrosive goods with passenger elevators.
sentences.cn: 禁止携带易燃易爆或带腐蚀性的危险品乘用电梯.
